title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 31
description: In the wake of prophetic new information, the Pine Guard’s plan to save both of their worlds undergoes an ambitious revision. To pull it off, they’ll have to forge more than a few uneasy alliances.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
